duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide triage, first aid, and/or referral to outside medical providers, if indicated.
Facilitate and maintain the workers’ compensation and return to work process for associates with work related injuries.
Participate in incident investigations and weekly case management review meetings.
Maintain appropriate medical supply inventory and ensure a clean and orderly environment.
Coach on observed at-risk work habits and spend frequent time on the warehouse floor to interact with AAs and managers.
Maintain daily activity logs and end of shift reports.
Lead emergency response at the site.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Exercise Sciences, Exercise Physiology, Health Sciences, or Kinesiology
